mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(username, email, password, name,address,phone,gender,role,provider,providerId,createDate) VALUES(#{username},#{email},#{password}, #{name},#{address},#{phone},#{gender},#{role},#{provider},#{providerId}, now())
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username} , email = #{email} ,name=#{name}, password=#{password}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, gender=#{gender} where id = #{id}
